attributes.action: Scrap that part of planning law which allows developers to apply for planning permission on a property without owning that property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This horrendous existing situation places people under tremendous pressure to sell their homes and gardens to uncaring and unscrupulous developers, who use increasingly devious and bullying practices to acquire their precious land.  Let's please put an end to this destructive and unneighbourly practice.
